snippet.title: Roman Triumph: Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Roman Triumph is a survival city-builder set in Roman times. Lead your people, build and fortify your city, and survive against Barbarian hordes and mythological beasts like the Hydra and Dragon. Keep your citizens fed, safe, and happy while balancing the favor of the gods to ensure your city's prosperity. Trade, build, research, and defend!

Wishlist & Follow: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1864880/Roman_Triumph_Survival_City_Builder/

X: https://x.com/Coreffect
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/HXBHtqDQQr
